title: Group polarization refers to tendency for what

content.question: The term group polarization refers to the tendency for

choices.label: two opposing factions to emerge within a group
the prevailing opinion within a group to become more extreme after discussion
a single leader to eventually dominate most groups
one or more group members to eventually have their opinions disregarded

content.answer: the prevailing opinion within a group to become more extreme after discussion

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
